item.title: Life with Apple's iWatch
item.description: I confess, Iâ€™m a bit of a gadget hound. I own four different smart watches all with different OSs: Pebble with PebbleOS Samsung Gear with Tizen Motorola 360 with Android Wear and now Apple iWatch with WatchOS When I first got the Pebble (Kickstarter model) I was instantly impressed. It was a device that lasted days, gave me notifications at a glance, and allowed me keep my phone in my pocket unless it was really needed.
